<title level="1" right="Rules">[Trait](/Rules.aspx?ID=3313)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A trait is a keyword that conveys additional information about a rules element, such as which ancestry a feat belongs to or the rarity of an item. Often, a trait indicates how other rules interact with an ability, creature, item, or another rules element that has that trait. 

 All the traits used in this book appear in the Glossary and Index beginning on page 452. The traits page on Archives of Nethys can be found [here](Traits.aspx).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
